choices: the box with the red button
1.content:
You walk into the new antique store but later realize you have no idea why you decided to come in here.
Seeing as nobody was here you feel a bit bad and wander to the clearance section.

"Well I might as well buy something" You thought to yourself.
After looking through all these "fine" objects you chuckle to yourself thinking this is some kind of joke section.
In the end you decide to get the. . . .

***Reminder of what each object does***

A gold Rope - It has the ability to cut objects and put them back together

A jar of blue liquid - the liquid turns whoever touches it into a slime creature that can eat and transform to anything it touches

A box with a red button - It can flatten whoever touches it, you can also wear the person as a skin suit

A dream catcher - if you sleep under it you can astral project your soul to posses people and objects

A box of cards - a box of cards from a card game you never heard of. It has blank cards to capture people and several extra cards to do as you please with them
1.title: Begining

choices: Use it on Your little brother
use it on your girlfriend's sister
use it on one of your friends
12.content:
You purchased the jar and walked home.
Toss it in the air looking at it.

"So this thing will turn whatever it touches into a slime creature. . . "

You get home and get into your room staring at the jar.
"Well this sounds fake but I guess it would be a fun prank."
You open the jar and notice the slime inside starts moving as if waiting for it to be freed.
"What the" You say putting it down.
The slime now moving around the jar
"Are you alive?" You ask it
It forms a small mound and nods.
"And you'll turn anyone that touches you into a slime .. . ."
It nodes again.
You think about this for a second. And think of how cool it would be to be a slime. . .or to make someone your slime slave.
After thinking about it, you decided to. . . .
12.title: the jar

choices: You decided to go to your girlfriend
You go to your brother's room
You go to your friends house
121.content:
You open the jar, and the slime jumps out and wraps around you, covering your body.
"W-wha?" You say as it covers every inch of you
You feel a warm sensation all over you almost burning but very sensual.
You moan as you fall to the ground and your clothes melt away
You feel your body soften and slowly getting clearer.
You start to lose your sense and start to lose the feeling on your body
Eventually your body becomes a clear bluish form with a red ball in your chest.
You fall apart splattering on the ground.
"That. .. was weird" You think to yourself.
You try to get up but are unable to, looking like a giant wiggling jellow.
"Okay. . .Focus" You think repeatedly, thinkinng of your old body.
Your body starts to slowly form.
Eventually you form a body that looks like your old one, but made of a blue liquid and a puddle where your feet were.
You move your "Hand" to your face and see that it looks like a spatula.
You slowly start moving them slowly apart forming fingers.
You move to your mirror
"Not bad. . ." You think
You start trying to form a mouth and try speaking
"Wa. .. wab. . .y....yu" You try speaking
"O. . .kay. . .we. . .gett. .som. . .where"
You start to focus more, and your blue liquid body start to look more solid and your body slowly starts forming a "skin" with the same tone.
Your feet start sucking up the puddle and forming.
Eventually you start looking like a naked version of yourself
"Phew.. ." you sighed with release "That took a while. . .but I'm back to normal sorta" You say turning your hand to the clear blue liquid form.
You try experimenting with your new body able to stretch from one end of the room to another and try turning into different shapes.
You then tried turning into your girlfriend, but turned into a puddle.
You form back to your original body
"What the. . ." You pick up the instructions that came with the jar and read it
"To turn into another person . . .first I have to EAT THEM? and absorb them into your core??" You said staring at the red marble in your chest.
"But don't worry, if you eat somebody you can transform into them, make slime clones, or release them. . .well guess thats not TOO bad" You say trying to think of the possibilities
"Guess I'll test out my new powers. . ."
121.title: Use the slime on yourself

choices: Leave Tony's body and visit your girlfriend
Posses another object in Tony's room
Take the dream catcher to your girlfriend's place
14.content:
"I guess I'll get this" You said grabbing the dream catcher.
After paying for the Dream Catcher you head home and put it on the wall
"Well lets see if this works" You said with an air of skeptism.
You fall asleep quickly but is awakened when you feel floating
"W-wha?" You scream as you realize you are floating, but you can see your body
"Okay. . .Weird dream but okay. . ." You say floating around your room
You start to experiment and notice you can move objects.
You can also pass through walls
You then go into your brother's room and see him on his computer.
"Hmm. . .I wonder" You say putting your hands on one of his figures of anime girls
You then get sucked in but stay conscious
You start to move around "Wow I actually did it" You thought to yourself
Tony noticed the movement and stared at you
"Thats weird. . . Thats not the pose I left you in. . ." He says picking you up and readjusting you
Tony was a pretty good looking guy, nice medium figure, good grades, but really shy.

You start to giggle "Hey that tickles!" you say
"WHAT THE?" Tony say falling over dropping you.
Tony looks like he was about to scream, and that'll blow your cover.
"Shit .. . .Think fast. . ." You say to yourself "Got it!"
You jump out of the figures body and into Tony's
Unlike moving into an object you feel a bit of a struggle from Tony but eventually you possessed his body.
You walk over to a mirror and examine your new body.
"Wow I can't believe that worked. . ." You say in Tony's voice.
You start to examine his body even pulling down his shorts (out of curiosity)
"Well at least I beat him in this department" You say thinking about how Tony beats you in video games and grades.
"I got an idea. . ."
14.title: the dream catcher

info.brief_description: You are a boy who goes into a new store and decide to purchase an "cursed" item.
info.description:
You are a boy named Yu who go into a new antique store that opened in town. After looking around you see nothing of particular interest, but you felt bad that there is nobody there buying anything. So you decided to check out the clearance section and see the following objects:

A gold Rope - It has the ability to cut objects and put them back together

A jar of blue liquid - the liquid turns whoever touches it into a slime creature that can eat and transform to anything it touches

A box with a red button - It can flatten whoever touches it, you can also wear the person as a skin suit

A dream catcher - if you sleep under it you can astral project your soul to posses people and objects

A box of cards - a box of cards from a card game you never heard of. It has blank cards to capture people and several extra cards to do as you please with them

Rules
No killing off anybody
No scat, diapers
No racial slurs
No ending
I reserve the right to change or delete chapters as i see fit
Feel free to add characters but when you add them give a brief bio in the chapter

Characters
